control.name: cbMasterTablePosition
control.description: A LayoutItemDragController object moves the Master Table. This object contains methods to move a layout item to a position next to another layout item. In this demo the Move method is used. When Master Table is docked to the bottom or top, it arranges its cards in a single row; when docked to the left or right edge - in a single column. This feature is performed by assigning different values to the ViewMode property.

control.name: allowEditOnDoubleClick
control.description: When double-click editing is enabled, the DoubleClick event is handled. The CalcHitInfo method is used to obtain information about elements located at a specific point. See the 'Edit Order...' button code for more details.

control.name: detailShowHideBtn
control.description: Clicking this button retrieves the index of the data source record to which the specified row handle corresponds and assigns the detail view to the grid control's MainView property.

control.name: masterGrid
control.description: Create an expression via the GridColumn.UnboundExpression property or handle the CustomUnboundColumnData event to provide data for unbound columns.

control.name: detailGrid
control.description: To switch from a general view to a details view, use the MainView property. Two separate views are assigned to this property depending on data that needs to be displayed.
